title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Drain pasta, combine with pancetta, and stir in egg mixture.
Serve hot with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill chicken pieces until lightly charred.
Fry onions and tomatoes into a masala paste.
Add cream and grilled chicken to the sauce.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.
